00025 #include "lpc17xx_timer.h"
00026 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00028 #include "debug_frmwrk.h"
00029 
00030 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00037 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00038 uint8_t menu1[] =
00039 "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00040 "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00041 "Timer delay demo \n\r"
00042 "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00043 "\t - Core: ARM Cortex-M3 \n\r"
00044 "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00045 " Use timer 0 in polling mode \n\r"
00046 " Toggle MAT0.0 at frequency 10Hz \n\r"
00047 "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00048 //timer init
00049 TIM_TIMERCFG_Type TIM_ConfigStruct;
00050 TIM_MATCHCFG_Type TIM_MatchConfigStruct;
00051 
00052 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00053 void print_menu(void);
00054 
00055 
00056 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00057 /*********************************************************************/
00062 void print_menu(void)
00063 {
00064         _DBG(menu1);
00065 }

00068 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00069 /*********************************************************************/
00074 int c_entry(void)
00075 {
00076         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00077 
00078         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00079          * – 115200bps
00080          * – 8 data bit
00081          * – No parity
00082          * – 1 stop bit
00083          * – No flow control
00084          */
00085         debug_frmwrk_init();
00086 
00087         // print welcome screen
00088         print_menu();
00089 
00090         // Conifg P1.28 as MAT0.0
00091         PinCfg.Funcnum = 3;
00092         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00093         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00094         PinCfg.Portnum = 1;
00095         PinCfg.Pinnum = 28;
00096         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00097 
00098         // Initialize timer 0, prescale count time of 100uS
00099         TIM_ConfigStruct.PrescaleOption = TIM_PRESCALE_USVAL;
00100         TIM_ConfigStruct.PrescaleValue  = 100;
00101 
00102         // use channel 0, MR0
00103         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.MatchChannel = 0;
00104         // Disable interrupt when MR0 matches the value in TC register
00105         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.IntOnMatch   = TRUE;
00106         //Enable reset on MR0: TIMER will reset if MR0 matches it
00107         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.ResetOnMatch = TRUE;
00108         //Stop on MR0 if MR0 matches it
00109         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.StopOnMatch  = FALSE;
00110         //Toggle MR0.0 pin if MR0 matches it
00111         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.ExtMatchOutputType =TIM_EXTMATCH_TOGGLE;
00112         // Set Match value, count value of 1000 (1000 * 100uS = 100mS --> 10Hz)
00113         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.MatchValue   = 1000;
00114 
00115         // Set configuration for Tim_config and Tim_MatchConfig
00116         TIM_Init(LPC_TIM0, TIM_TIMER_MODE,&TIM_ConfigStruct);
00117         TIM_ConfigMatch(LPC_TIM0,&TIM_MatchConfigStruct);
00118         TIM_Cmd(LPC_TIM0,ENABLE);
00119         while (1)
00120         {
00121                 // Wait for 1000 millisecond
00122                 while ( !(TIM_GetIntStatus(LPC_TIM0,TIM_MR0_INT)));
00123                 TIM_ClearIntPending(LPC_TIM0,0);
00124                 _DBG_("Match interrupt occur..");
00125         }
00126         TIM_DeInit(LPC_TIM0);
00127         return (1);
00128 }
00129 
00130 /* Support required entry point for other toolchain */
00131 int main (void)
00132 {
00133         return c_entry();
00134 }
00135 
00136 #ifdef  DEBUG
00137 /*******************************************************************************
00138 * @brief                Reports the name of the source file and the source line number
00139 *                               where the CHECK_PARAM error has occurred.
00140 * @param[in]    file Pointer to the source file name
00141 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00142 * @return               None
00143 *******************************************************************************/
00144 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
00145 {
00146         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00147          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00148 
00149         /* Infinite loop */
00150         while(1);
00151 }
